meanings.definition: A person or thing that sheds.
meanings.sent1: The dog's fur shedders were scattered all over the house.
meanings.sent2: The shedders on the tree fell to the ground in autumn.
meanings.sent3: The shedders from the pine tree made a trail for us to follow.
meanings.sent4: The shedders of old skin revealed a new layer underneath.
meanings.sent5: The shedders of leaves created a colorful carpet on the forest floor.

meanings.sent1: She collected the shedders from the trees to use in her art project.
meanings.sent2: The shedders in the garden needed to be cleaned up before the party.
meanings.sent3: The shedders in the shed were organized neatly by size.
meanings.sent4: The shedders of tears were a sign of her deep emotions.
meanings.sent5: The shedders of feathers floated gracefully in the air.
